description: This notification indicates that openflow session changes to down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDown HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowIpType i 0 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowRemoteIp s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowLocalIp s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowVpnInstanceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowDatapathId s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowAuxiliaryId u 9999 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownSubReason u 9999 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownReason i 1

description: Indicates the administrative IP type of openflow node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowIpType

description: Indicates the administrative IP address of openflow remote node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowRemoteIp

description: Indicates the administrative IP address of openflow local node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowLocalIp

description: This object indicates the vpn instance's name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowVpnInstanceName

description: Indicates the datapath unique ID. The lower 48-bits are for
a MAC address, while the upper 16-bits are implementer-defined.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowDatapathId

description: Indicates the auxiliary connection ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowAuxiliaryId

description: Indicates the detail reason of openflow connection down. If no detail reason, the value of the node will be zero.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownSubReason

description: This object indicates the cause that the openflow connection becomes down.
Options:
1. tcpDown(1) --indicates tcp down.
2. heartbeatTimeout(2) --indicates openflow heartbeat timeout.
3. pduError(3) --indicates openflow message data is wrong.
4. connectionUp(4) --indicates connection is up.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownReason

description: This notification indicates that openflow session changes to up.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownClear HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowIpType i 0 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowRemoteIp s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowLocalIp s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowVpnInstanceName s EXAMPLE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowDatapathId s EXAMPLEE HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowAuxiliaryId u 9999 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownSubReason u 9999 HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownReason i 1

description: Indicates the administrative IP type of openflow node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowIpType

description: Indicates the administrative IP address of openflow remote node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowRemoteIp

description: Indicates the administrative IP address of openflow local node.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowLocalIp

description: This object indicates the vpn instance's name.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowVpnInstanceName

description: Indicates the datapath unique ID. The lower 48-bits are for
a MAC address, while the upper 16-bits are implementer-defined.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowDatapathId

description: Indicates the auxiliary connection ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowAuxiliaryId

description: Indicates the detail reason of openflow connection down. If no detail reason, the value of the node will be zero.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownSubReason

description: This object indicates the cause that the openflow connection becomes down.
Options:
1. tcpDown(1) --indicates tcp down.
2. heartbeatTimeout(2) --indicates openflow heartbeat timeout.
3. pduError(3) --indicates openflow message data is wrong.
4. connectionUp(4) --indicates connection is up.
variables.name: HUAWEI-OPENFLOW-MIB::hwOpenflowConnectionDownReason
